sen.j: あんみつ（餡蜜）は、みつまめに餡を盛った和菓子。
sen.e: Anmitsu is a kind of Japanese confectionery, which is mitsumame dessert (boiled beans, cubes of agar gelatin, and other delicacies with molasses poured on) covered with bean jam.
sen.cmt: 和菓子は、Referenceフォルダー内の281007_中村歌右衛門 (6代目).xlsでは、Japanese-style confectionaryとなっていましたが、共有サイトの用語に合わせました。みつまめは、共有サイトの用語をそのまま使用しましたので、次の項目の説明との重複感があります。
sen.e: Anmitsu is a kind of Japanese confectionery, which is mitsumame dessert (boiled beans, cubes of agar gelatin, and other delicacies with molasses poured on) covered with bean jam.
Anmitsu is a kind of Japanese confectionery, which is mitsumame dessert (boiled beans, cubes of agar gelatin, and other delicacies with molasses poured on) covered with bean jam.

sen.j: 賽の目（細かい立方体）状に切った寒天に、茹でて冷やした赤エンドウマメ、小豆餡、求肥、干しアンズなどをのせる。
sen.e: It is the cubes of agar gelatin topped with boiled and chilled red peas, azuki bean jam, gyuhi (a kind of rice cake made from glutinous rice or glutinous rice flour), and dried apricot.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It consists of cubes of agar gelatin topped with boiled and chilled red peas, azuki bean jam, gyuhi (a kind of rice cake made from glutinous rice or glutinous rice flour), and dried apricot.
sen.cmt: 先頭部分の文構成の見直し
sen.e: It consists of cubes of agar gelatin topped with boiled and chilled red peas, azuki bean jam, gyuhi (a kind of rice cake made from glutinous rice or glutinous rice flour), and dried apricot.

sen.j: みつ（黒蜜や白蜜）をかけて食べる。
sen.e: It is eaten with syrup (molasses or dark molasses).
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: It is eaten with syrup (molasses or dark molasses) poured over it.
It is eaten with syrup (molasses or dark molasses) poured over it.

sen.j: 四季を問わず販売・提供されているが、特に夏の風物詩として知られている。
sen.e: Regardless of four seasons, it is sold and served, but is well-known as a summer feature.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Regardless of four seasons, it is sold and served, but is well-known as a summer feature.
Regardless of four seasons, it is sold and served, but is well-known as a summer feature.

sen.j: みつまめと共に夏の季語に分類されている。
sen.e: Both anmitsu and mitsumame are categorized into summer kigo (season words)
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文の例外対処
sen.e: Both anmitsu and mitsumame are categorized into summer kigo (season words)
Both anmitsu and mitsumame are categorized into summer kigo (season words)

sen.j: また、大相撲観戦の土産である「相撲あんみつ」が知られている。
sen.e: Sumo anmitsu (anmitsu served in grand sumo tournaments), is also well-known as a souvenir when watching the grand sumo tournament.
Sumo anmitsu (anmitsu served in grand sumo tournaments), is also well-known as a souvenir when watching the grand sumo tournament.
Sumo anmitsu (anmitsu served in grand sumo tournaments), is also well-known as a souvenir when watching the grand sumo tournament.

sen.j: 京都、鎌倉、浅草、上野などのあんみつが有名である。
sen.e: Anmitsu sold at Kyoto, Kamakura, Asakusa, and Ueno are famous.
Anmitsu sold at Kyoto, Kamakura, Asakusa, and Ueno are famous.
Anmitsu sold at Kyoto, Kamakura, Asakusa, and Ueno are famous.
Variation
Variation
Variation

sen.j: あんみつには みつまめと同様、様々なバリエーションが存在する。
sen.e: Anmitsu has many variations just like mitsumame.
Anmitsu has many variations just like mitsumame.
Anmitsu has many variations just like mitsumame.

sen.j: クリームあんみつ：ホイップした生クリーム、もしくはソフトクリームをのせたもの
sen.e: Cream anmitsu: anmitsu with whipped fresh cream or soft serve ice cream.
sen.cmt: ここでは、クリームあんみつを定義しているので、共有サイトのクリームあんみつの()内の説明を定義とした形式にしました。
sen.e: Cream anmitsu: anmitsu with whipped fresh cream or soft serve ice cream.
Cream anmitsu: anmitsu with whipped fresh cream or soft serve ice cream.

sen.j: 白玉あんみつ：白玉をのせたもの
sen.e: Shiratama anmitsu: anmitsu topped with rice-flour dumplings.
sen.cmt: ここでは、クリームあんみつを定義しているので、共有サイトのクリームあんみつの()内の説明を定義とした形式にしました。
sen.e: Shiratama anmitsu: anmitsu topped with rice-flour dumplings.
Shiratama anmitsu: anmitsu topped with rice-flour dumplings.

sen.j: 白玉クリームあんみつ
sen.e: Shiratama cream anmitsu
sen.cmt: 原文には定義がないので、そのままにしてます。
sen.e: Shiratama cream anmitsu
Shiratama cream anmitsu

sen.j: フルーツあんみつ：カットした果物（キウイフルーツ、サクランボ、パイナップル、ミカンなど）をのせたもの
sen.e: Fruit anmitsu: anmitsu topped with chopped fruits (such as kiwi fruit, cherry, pineapple, and mandarin orange.)
Fruit anmitsu: anmitsu topped with chopped fruits (such as kiwi fruit, cherry, pineapple, and mandarin orange).
sen.cmt: ピリオドの括弧の外に移動
sen.e: Fruit anmitsu: anmitsu topped with chopped fruits (such as kiwi fruit, cherry, pineapple, and mandarin orange).
